snippet.title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider - The Nightmare
snippet.description:
Journey through “The Nightmare,” as Lara Croft faces off against familiar enemies and fallen friends available here: https://TombRaider.Games/seaso59409

Explore Croft Manor in a harrowing trial unlike anything she has faced before. In order to obtain a powerful weapon, Lara must conquer, in either single-player or co-op, the latest challenge tomb, “Howl of the Monkey Gods.” 

Subscribe to our channel to keep up-to-date with all things Tomb Raider and Lara Croft: https://www.youtube.com/user/tombraider?sub_confirmation=1

Follow us on Social:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TombRaider
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tombraider
Tumblr: http://tombraider.tumblr.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tombraider
